name: Multo ilaw
description:
This is my first solo small publicly released game. This was built for learning game development more and wanting to add to my portfolio, especially towards the audio side.

Play as Multo, where you must bring a light to a village in order to ward off the evil spirits.

Goal: Reach to 200 Points!
Controls:

  • W or Up Arrow: Move Up
  • S or Down Arrow: Move Down
  • Spacebar: Phase
  • Escape: Quit Game

Soundtrack: https://firahfabe.bandcamp.com/album/multo-ilaw-game-soundtrack
